import React, {useState} from 'react' function ClientForm() { con function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); fetch("http://localhost:9292/clients", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ name: name, email: email, phone_number: phoneNumber, location: location, developer_id: developerId }), }) .then((r) => r.json()) .then((newClient) => setClient(newClient)); } return (
